channel.title: [PI]Monsters no dropping bones?
channel.description:
Its strange because is the first time this happens since I putted the server just for my firneds; a friend was killing steel dragons and like he got connection lost, and conected again. But when he kills any monsters Bones are not getting dropped, all items yes, but bones nop:(.
What could be wrong?
